lender.name: Sherri
lender.loan_because: A lot of people have dreams and never do anything about them. When you have ideas and dreams, you do something about it. - Paul Newman

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I can, and it is a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info:
I'm retired. I do some volunteer driving for local agencies. I travel a bit. I'm dabbling in family history research. I read. I watch. I try, more or less unsuccessfully, not to judge.
I play a lot of Free Cell on the computer.
I listen to most kinds of music.
I've been into digital photography for ten years or better, but I don't do much picture taking any more.

lender.name: Jaume
lender.loan_because: I do believe in the entrepreneurial spirit of people. We should give the chance to those people who don't have access to financial sources to achieve the minimum quality of life they deserve. Everybody needs an oportunity, and two as well!

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: Because it's the right thing to do...

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I like helping others and empowering people to reach for their dreams and make a better life for themselves.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: My friend Lolo lassoed me into doing this. After saying that, I really do believe that as individuals we can help impact that live of other people around the world, even if it is one small loan at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a registered nurse in a neonatal intensive care unit helping to care for premature and sick babies. I love what I do and I work with a great group of people. What else could you ask for?

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: it doesn't make sense not to.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a school district and help use data gathered about students to better improve their education and to help administrators make the most informed decisions possible.

lender.name: Ryan Stephenson
lender.loan_because: I believe micro-credit is uniquely a 21st century idea that has the power to positively change the fortunes of millions.

lender.name: Vast Media LLC
lender.loan_because: We like to help people.

lender.name: Kai
lender.loan_because: I believe in the resilience of the human spirit and admire the determination and hope of the entrepreneurs in the developing world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying to learn about how business works around the world.

lender.name: stephanie
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to better their lives through work.

lender.name: Cecilia
lender.loan_because: I know and believe that programs like Kiva can and do make a difference. They can change peoples lives, by empowering them to be able to help themselves and in doing so take a step towards eliminating poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I conduct research aimed at improving services available to families and children

lender.name: Rich
lender.loan_because: It keeps dreams alive.
lender.occupational_info: Seeker of the truth

lender.name: Ray & Bev
lender.loan_because: If we are ever to live together in peace we must do what we can to help one another

lender.name: Irene
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Carolina
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: 3rd Grade

lender.name: Pops
lender.loan_because: in honor of Jakey Witz
lender.occupational_info: Attorney

lender.name: Sarah.S
lender.loan_because: i loan because i lost huge amount of money.. and i want need some money to get things back normal the way was before.as you can see my picture i was crying because no one would help me down here so please my good people in thy Lord i need Loan
lender.occupational_info: i am a big and well know business woman i Export and Import Food within the country here in nigeria.

lender.name: Candi & her sons
lender.loan_because: I believe that women can become stronger through entrepreneurship. We are all linked and need one another.
lender.occupational_info: To quote Hugh Downs: "To say that your fate is not tied to my fate is like saying your end of the boat is sinking." I am doing my part to make sure that our boat does not sink.

lender.name: Paul
lender.occupational_info: I support computer programs and databases at the University of Utah Hospital and Clinics.

lender.name: Soyoung
lender.occupational_info: Scientific research, studying primate brains.

lender.name: Preeti
lender.loan_because: to empower and provide honest, hard working people an opportunity to better their lives and to let them know there are people in the world rooting for their success.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I know that this works! A little money to promote opportunity goes so far in helping people care for their family and community. This is SO true in former worn-torn nations like Sierra Leone and Congo.
lender.occupational_info: Former international aid worker turned mom.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: Microfinance works.

lender.name: Katerina
lender.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurs in Eastern Europe.
lender.occupational_info: I help to develop business strategy for a major media and software company.

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: Nobody can do everything, but everyone can do something. -unknown

lender.name: DEAL 4
lender.loan_because: It just feels good to do something good! Give and it shall be given unto you!

lender.name: Mary
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I have retired in Austin, Texas. We have three grown children and two young grandchildren. I make quilts that I donate to children in need in central Texas.

lender.name: JoAnn
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to share the abundance we've been given with the working poor.

lender.name: Karen
lender.occupational_info: I was a commercial fisherman for 26 years. I am now a caregiver for my disabled husband.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: Who knows?
lender.occupational_info: small vegetable farmer

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: I am very lucky to live in Australia. I've never had to struggle to live, or support my children. I've been overseas and have been reduced to tears at the poverty some people have to endure. If I can help just one or two people to get out of poverty and live a happy life, I feel like my time on earth has been worthwhile.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office, doing book-keeping (paying bills and sending bills to customers).

lender.name: Jos
lender.loan_because: small scale business is my field of work and I believe in it!
lender.occupational_info: I support beginning small business entrepreneurs with my knowledge and experience

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: it works- such a small commitment, but it makes such a difference.

lender.name: C.W.
lender.occupation: Author and Member of Young At Heart Team
lender.loan_because: We want to make a positive difference in the lives of people.

lender.name: W kids
lender.loan_because: My kids pick the loans. They love giving and they are learning about the power of micro-finance!
lender.occupational_info: Kids donating part of their personal allowance each week.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: the efficiency of granting funds to smaller groups is so much better than throwing our aid money at a foreign government and asking them to deal with it. Worldwide economic stability means greater safety for everyone in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I design and build parts for airplanes and helicopters.

lender.name: Mona
lender.loan_because: I feel honored to be of a little help to people who are trying hard to make a living.
lender.occupational_info: I used to do secretarial work but am retired and now enjoy family, yard work, cooking, volunteering and painting pictures.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I am pro-woman
lender.occupational_info: Diplomat

lender.name: Darwin & Tami
lender.loan_because: We like to help people
lender.occupational_info: We work in hospitals taking care of people who are sick and injured.

lender.name: Nina
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs something at some point
lender.occupational_info: Administrative, paperwork and computers

lender.name: Adrienne
lender.loan_because: I think it is a great way to help people who are really working to improve their lives

lender.name: Rosemary
lender.loan_because: i want to make a difference

lender.name: Ballou!
lender.loan_because: Matthew 25:35-40
lender.occupational_info: We are artists, students, writers, bakers, mothers, administrators, teachers, fathers and more...

lender.name: Neil
lender.loan_because: Charity towards those in need is a great and necessary thing, but self-sustaining economic development offers a longer-term solution. Microfinance empowers people to improve their situation through their own hard work.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I want others to feel successful and proud of their abilities.
lender.occupational_info: I teach writing and literature at a small university.

lender.name: Anais
lender.loan_because: everyone should take help take care of their fellow human beings.
lender.occupational_info: i'm a mom

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I like helping people.
lender.occupational_info: I help plan advertising.

lender.name: Stefan
lender.loan_because: I'm only 15 and yet I want to make a difference in other people's lives. I have a lot and I want to give back.
lender.occupational_info:
I go to school and I want to help.
:D

lender.name: Tedi
lender.loan_because: I like to help.
lender.occupational_info: teach kids how to use computers

lender.name: Wyatt
lender.loan_because: the world needs new people to help others make their dream come true. that is why i help others.
lender.occupational_info: i am a student in high school who is interusted in world reations, and this website helps me help and connect with others in need.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I am now able to give back to others who are struggling. Neighbors helping neighbors is a rural custom in my community. the world has now become one community.
lender.occupational_info: Project management; non profit administration; strategic planning facilition and visioning

lender.name: Asia
lender.occupational_info: I help teach teenagers about Jesus Christ.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: someone changed my life when they provided me with a loan
lender.occupational_info: I sell print and internet advertising

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: it's a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I build software for education

lender.name: Lynette
lender.loan_because: I think it makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: learning to be a psychologist

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: Starting a business is tough. Starting a business with little or no money is even tougher. Being able to help in this small way is encouraging. When we are willing to serve and encourage others, even across continents, we are able to impact our world in a positive way.
lender.occupational_info: I love to bake. I love to give. I love to make others smile - through baking and giving.

lender.name: Keven
lender.occupational_info: I teach finance at a university.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life and this is a way I can give back.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell parts to fix diesel engines

lender.name: Matthew and Shasta
lender.loan_because: we love to spread hope and prosperity throughout the world. As entrepreneurs ourselves, we got a lot of help financially getting started. We're just trying to pass the blessing forward!
lender.occupational_info: We help repair homes damaged by flooding, fires, and mold. It can be as small as a pipe leak, or as large as a hurricane!

lender.name: Ali Berman
lender.loan_because: providing an opportunity can change a life and make a difference

lender.name: Veronica French
lender.loan_because: It helps make the world go round instead of down.

lender.name: De Witt
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a global bank, HSBC in Risk Management.

lender.name: Murray Family
lender.loan_because: My husband and I started loaning because we want to model generosity for our 6 year old daughter. If we all do this with our kids the effects can be exponential. We love the idea of helping empower people all over the world to create or grow a means of income. Kiva helps us give in a way we were never been able to before.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I both work in education.

lender.name: David
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work to bring business to our hotel.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful way for me to give something back to a world that's given me so much.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a neurology practice where I also do patient advocacy work. It's challenging because the need is so great.

lender.name: Eleni
lender.loan_because: I have heard great things about micro lending and I think its a fabulous idea!
lender.occupational_info: I am going to university right now, im in my last year.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: My loans to friends have been dismal failures. My loans thru Kiva have always been repaid. What does that tell you?
lender.occupational_info: I am retired after 27 years in public works construction, including time with US Army Corps of Engineers.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I think handouts are less effective than a hand up.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of animals.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an emergency RN that takes care of people of all ages with critical and life threatening health problems as well as those with minor injuries and illness.

lender.name: Jeff Parker
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I am currently in college. I have a triple Associates Degree and I am currently pursuing my Bachelors Degree in Business Administration.

lender.name: Reid
lender.loan_because: It encourages ....
lender.occupational_info: I write damage appraisals for insurance companies, mostly for natural disasters.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs some help at some time. People have helped me during my life. I feel good doing the same for others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a real estate agent. I help people find a home to buy. I also help people who want to sell their homes.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the power of setting goals, hard work and determination.
lender.occupational_info: I am the editor and publisher of a community newspaper that serves the North Olympic Peninsula of Washington state. We are located (by ferryboat and road) about 2.5 hours northwest of Seattle.

lender.name: Makoto Sakai
lender.loan_because: I would like to contribute to increasing opportunities for many people to work by themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a University Lecturer, I belong to Bunkyo University in Japan. My major is Japanese modern history and media studies.

lender.name: Anum M.
lender.loan_because: there is no them

lender.name: Jens
lender.loan_because: I believe that its better to give the means for others to live out their dream, than to guess what their dreams is and then fund that...
lender.occupational_info: I help hospitals make better decisions based on better knowledge of allready available data.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I am in a position to try and help others within our world community.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: it's a worthwhile thing for me to do.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I think micro-loans provide people with good ideas a chance to implement those ideas to enhance their own lives and the lives of the others in their community.
lender.occupational_info: As a professor of sociology, I teach about understanding human behavior and society. As director of the American Humanics Program, I prepare students to become successful leaders of nonprofit organizations (or NGOs).

lender.name: Lali
lender.loan_because: que menos!!!

lender.name: Boston Mike
lender.loan_because: because i can so i should
lender.occupational_info: i take classes at my school so i can be a well educated person....ya tu sabes...vive la raza!... si se puede!

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: A small amount can make a huge difference to many

lender.name: Johan
lender.loan_because: I can and I care!

lender.name: Kim
lender.occupational_info: I often help people that have been around the health system and medicine cabinet. I work with chinese medicine and treat the person not just the illness.

lender.name: Shelia
lender.loan_because: The way to a better world is respect and self sufficiency, built one person at a time. "Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime." Chinese Proverb
lender.occupational_info: Doing all the big and little jobs that take care of my family.

lender.name: Judy and Rob
lender.loan_because: We are lucky to live in a country where we have all we need and then some. It is gratifying to have a personal connection to an entrepreneur on the other side of the world and to follow their successes.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I believe individuals share the common desire to see our lives improved, our families supported, and to build a community where each is respected and loved. Kiva is a remarkable opportunity to foster these goals.
lender.occupational_info: I work with individuals to manage their money.

lender.name: Steven Wevodau
lender.occupational_info: http://www.stevenwevodau.com http://www.stevenwevodau.org http://www.stevenwevodau.net http://www.stevenwevodau.info

lender.name: Maggie
lender.occupational_info: I am currently studying to become a pharmacist. Once I earn my degree, I hope to improve access to healthcare and resources.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I've always wanted to make a difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I am part of a team that manages a retail store that employees over three hundred people in one location.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: A small loan to a motivated person can make the world change, at least for their local community.

lender.name: Missy
lender.loan_because: It's cool. It's cool. It's really, really cool. Really.
lender.occupational_info: Being with my children and helping one another grow in understanding and develop our interests and skills.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: It's my duty in life to serve.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Philips Healthcare in the heart defibrillator division.

lender.name: Krista
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help people!
lender.occupational_info: Customer service about products that people choose to live healthier lives.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I am passionate about entrepreneurship
lender.occupational_info: I invest in technology startups in the Los Angeles area

lender.name: Pat & Steve
lender.loan_because: we believe in the power of people helping one another as a means to create a more peaceful and hopeful world.
lender.occupational_info: Pat is a teacher with children who have disabilities. She helps them develop independence skills, self esteem, and academic skills. Steve teaches college students to improve their written English skills.

lender.name: runswimrun
lender.loan_because: i like licking people. yum, yum. maybe folks want to scratch my back.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: it's a good way to invest in the future. Helping specific individuals reach specific goals lets you more easily see the value in helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for IBM, doing technical support for our sales team. I help them explain the benefits of our products to our customers.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I've been in a position of need.
lender.occupational_info: Part-time book keeper, part-time entrepreneur.

lender.name: Stevenson Family
lender.loan_because: My family and I are blessed and one should pass on their blessings to others.

lender.name: Grear
lender.loan_because: I want to give back.
lender.occupational_info: Rewarding =)

lender.name: acw
lender.loan_because: Networking is a small key to open big doors.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a freelancer and lecturer in the field of modern education. Searching for enabling competencies to use the world wide learning web for sustainable learning. (Sorry for german english ...)

lender.name: Hanne Aasenden
lender.loan_because: I want to grow up and meet others of my same age all over the world and know that a little of my luck has been shared with them. Hopefully given them a possibility to go to school and living with their own mom and dad, who are able to support their education due to someone's will to share.
lender.occupational_info: I don't work yet ;) But I do help out sometimes, and I save up a little of what I earn, and that I use to lend out through kiva. I like this a lot better than giving to the red cross and unicef. I do give to those also sometimes of course. But I like so much that I can see how they look like! I also wish I could ask them questions sometimes..:) I think of going to some of the places where they life when I get older. When i grow up I think I will be a scientist, or a vet or a marine biologist... But it has to be something traveling around the world doing my job! :)

lender.name: Gabby
lender.loan_because: I want everybody to be happy!

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I can and should
lender.occupational_info: Conflict Resolution, mediation, advocacy.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: while global poverty is a seemingly insurmountable problem, microfinance is an accessible and personal part of the solution.
lender.occupational_info: I work with businesses and individuals to resolve legal disputes. The most rewarding part of my work involves helping businesses - small and large alike - avoid legal problems, and so grow their businesses in a responsible way. When lawsuits do arise, I work with my clients to resolve them as efficiently as possible.

lender.name: Juan Carlos
lender.loan_because: A small amount today can make a big difference tomorrow

lender.name: Aleisha
lender.loan_because: we are all one.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to interpret collective agreements between employees and their employer, the Canadian government. I ensure the employees receive all the rights and benefits that have been fought for over decades through collective bargaining.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: The power to change is within each of us. A small loan can make a large change and gives self-determination to those that need it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Health Science major, interested in epidemiology (study of disease), HIV/AIDS, social inequality.

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: My brother gave me $50 to loan as a birthday present.
lender.occupational_info: I serve drinks to people in a small local bar.

lender.name: Auburn
lender.occupation: welder iwas laidoff ijust startedmyown weldingshop

lender.name: Ted
lender.loan_because: It is an opportunity to make a difference in another part of the world in a more direct way than usual

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I want to help people that want to help themselves.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs help sometimes.
lender.occupational_info: As my son says, "Daddy push buttons?"

lender.name: Amine
lender.loan_because: it's good to give others a chance

lender.name: Traci
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to help others. I especially admire the hard working entrepreneurs out there who just need a little help getting started. Their examples of a good work ethic will make a difference to their families and those around them.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the state government, and I help regulate the real estate and mortgage professions to ensure honesty within the system.

lender.name: Tom
lender.occupational_info: I am a dentist with a practice in Revere, Massachusetts.

lender.name: Theresa
lender.loan_because: Helping others keeps me smiling :o)
lender.occupational_info: I am the Business Director for the web software development company, Cloudspace.

lender.name: Buky
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs help at one time or another. Being a part of helping these people realize their dreams is very rewarding. I wish them all the very best!

lender.name: Cloudspace
lender.loan_because: We are also a small business and want to help others with their small businesses. Not to mention, this is just a wonderful cause.
lender.occupational_info: We are a small company based out of Orlando, Florida that builds online web applications/software for other businesses and individuals.

lender.name: Wedge
lender.loan_because: I believe making financial assistance available to people whom the banks ignore is a good thing. I like doing good things.
lender.occupational_info: I write news articles for business and charities, so that people know what is happening.

lender.name: Laila Sofie Vegger
lender.loan_because: I want to help change the world. Our minds, our beliefs, our trust, our ways... Our attitude, trust and beliefs in one another is what creates the world as we know it.

lender.name: LSS
lender.loan_because: I wish the recipients had to repay a little interest, both to cover some of Kiva's costs and to add a bit to the lenders' portfolios, so they had more to reinvest. And it would get the recipients used to paying interest, which is important to repaying commercial loans, the next step to expand their businesses.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people the opportunity to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I study bacteria in order to learn about how life works.

lender.name: MARY
lender.loan_because: God has blessed my family, and so I want to pass some blessings on !

lender.name: Room 17A
lender.loan_because: We like Peru and we want to help Peruvians out.
lender.occupational_info: We learn!

lender.name: Sarah
lender.occupational_info: Creating programs that enable marginalized people in communities to better their lives.

lender.name: Vosseveld
lender.loan_because: We think KIVA is a great organization!
lender.occupational_info: We are working with 7 people in a prison library. Every year we organize a book sale with books which we wrote off. People who work in this prison can buy them for a small price. The profit of that day we always donate to a goodwill organization. This year we choose for KIVA.

lender.name: Juliet_Romeo
lender.loan_because: ... for the first time, being a single drop doesn't sound like being nothing.
lender.occupational_info: I help enterprises and research laboratories to work together, invest and develop innovative R&D projects.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: Diplomacy through localized capitalism seems like a decent approach to reduce distrust and hatred of America. No, I have no data to back that up.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people.

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: I truly believe poverty would be eradicted if everyone was given the opportunity to work and fend for themselves. Giving the youth and unpriviledged an opportunity to excel is the root of my heart!
lender.occupational_info: Assist people who are moving to other countries

lender.name: Dino
lender.loan_because: I am interested in helping those who want to help themselves. I have always wanted to see someone succeed and grow because they have worked hard and earned it. I look forward to seeing this growth in the people i loan to.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a hotel chain in Canada. I manage and coordinate all aspects of construction for the hotels, restaurants or associated renovations.

lender.name: Wayne and Evelyn
lender.loan_because: We believe it's money well invested in our world.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoyed writing computer programs; now I enjoy not writing programs every day.

lender.name: Yaoshiang Ho
lender.loan_because: I hope it'll help people climb out of poverty
lender.occupational_info: I sell movies and TV shows.

lender.name: TONY/SUE
lender.loan_because: WE DID SOME TRAVEL THIS YEAR AND SAW HOW HARD IT WAS FOR SOME PEOPLE THAT LIVE in LESS FORTUNATE COUNTRIES. WE HOPE OUR LOAN CAN HELP
lender.occupational_info: WE BOTH WORK FOR A MINING COMPANY

lender.name: Tien
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: Education

lender.name: Mariza
lender.loan_because: I love this life and I want to help others feel the same way.
lender.occupational_info: I perform investigations and write reports to help protect people from bad medicine.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of loaning out my money again and again!
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office as a secretary. I am also a hobby beekeeper.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I am a small-struggling home business owner, growing food and flowers and creating art. I want to feel close to someone in another country doing the same. I have kids and I struggle financially, but I am very, very well provided for by four friends in particular who help me through.
lender.occupational_info:
My _primary_ work is as a student, working at getting my 4-year degree and then a Master's, for Art Therapy.
My home business is also my work. This year, for example, I was able to harvest 25lbs of Jerusalum Artichokes, and then sell them to a local health food store for $55. Sometimes I am able to sell lavendar, or some of my photo-art.

lender.name: katie
lender.loan_because: it is the best way to give because you can do it over and over again!
lender.occupational_info: i do what people might calling learning--cramming my head with useless information until the day of a test, then letting it all pour out until there's nothing left of me but a bottomless pit which i fill with delicious vegan food

lender.name: Kris
lender.loan_because: My brother is in Uganda and turned me on to what a huge difference a small loan can make! Thanks Bill!

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I loan because much has been lent to me.
lender.occupational_info: I run a small middle school in a predominantly Latino community. Our children are bright, dedicated and have little money for education. We see to it that they go on to private high schools on scholarships and eventually go to University.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I've worked in microfinance for nearly ten years and know it helps low-income people better manage their lives. Kiva is a great idea.
lender.occupational_info: Work with microfinance institutions so they can make more loans to more more people worldwide

lender.name: Jennifer and the girls
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. We should give them money so they won't be poor and not get enough food. Economy is tight and we want to help out.
lender.occupational_info: Mom is a corporate lawyer, older daughter is in 5th grade and is a "good looking goof" (self-described), younger daughter is in 1st grade and likes school; her favorite color is blue.

lender.name: Cristina
lender.loan_because: fundraising is never easy, especially when you have to ask strangers for help
lender.occupational_info: I sell medical product to doctors to help them treat their patients

lender.name: Frannie
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner and I see the potential for others to be able to live their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I wear many hats, but I primarily divide my time between urban farming (fruits, veggies, honey, eggs) and creative endeavors.

lender.name: Emily Maroutian
lender.loan_because: giving is the ultimate blessing the giver can ever receive.
lender.occupational_info: Author and writer

lender.name: Money Smarts 4 Kids
lender.loan_because: It is wonderful to provide venture capital to an entrepreneur. Where else can $25 provide that experience.
lender.occupational_info: Our mission is to help promote financial literacy to young people. Part of this process is helping other people along the way.

lender.name: renee
lender.loan_because: People need access to capital to run a business.

lender.name: aurora
lender.loan_because: i need a loan for my daughters education, i need loan because travel business is slow in Boracay Island.
lender.occupational_info: I am a free lance tour operator residing in the island and i survive through referrals i would appreciate it if community groups could help me in this aspect, good for seminars and or individual travellers.

lender.name: LutherKiva
lender.loan_because: we are called to serve those in need.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: I can afford to loan $25, and when it joins with other contributions, it becomes a valuable contribution.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a computer, organizing information for my company and our customers.

lender.name: Eiji
lender.loan_because: I firmly believe that helping others will make me happy. Yes, I want to become even happier :-)
lender.occupational_info: I produce media to spread the messages of love, compassion, and altruism.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. I loan because I have a few dollars that could change someone elses life. I loan because it makes sense. I loan to empower others.
lender.occupational_info: I go to George Mason University full time as a student to earn a degree in Systems Engineering.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I have had so many amazing blessings in my life.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a small church camp, where children and youth come in the summer to spend time in nature, develop their spirituality, and deepen their relationships with each other.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to be able to help someone.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: These entrepreneurs are awesome

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: it makes more sense to give a step up than a hand out
lender.occupational_info: I wouk with computers

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping others become self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I teach literature at a high school for young artists.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I like to help people achieve their dreams

lender.name: Bill Moore
lender.loan_because: You must give something to your fellow men - even if it's a little thing, do something for others something for which you get no pay but the privilege of doing it
lender.occupational_info: I retired as a Disabled Veteran Employment Rep and was a Crash Rescue Firefighter. I now volunteer with veteran organizations assisting my fellow veterans and families and Produce a Veterans Cable Access Show titled The Route 9 Veterans Forum
